analysis_age: Phrase "Young and dynamic team" could be regarded as biased against older candidates

Providing and processing information, material and documents on request and liaising with information vendors. Execution of administrative tasks according to defined guidelines and procedures. Providing support to General Manager. Requirements:. Attention to details. Good verbal and written proficiency in English. Computer literacy at a high level. {"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::61470301f3ad9e5d6ef4cf27::headhunter_ru", "source": "headhunter_ru", "country": "RU", "company": "Adecco Russia", "position": "Ассистент отдела со знанием английского языка", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, гибкий график

Наш клиент, крупная международная компания, специализирующаяся на страховании, находится в поиске Ассистента отдела Урегулирования убытков со свободным английским языком (возможна полная и частичная занятость - минимум 25 ч. в неделю)

Responsibilities:

· Responsible for the maintenance of the system records, documents and electronic archives;

· Supporting the office manager;

· Providing and processing information, material and documents on request and liaising with information vendors;

· Execution of administrative tasks according to defined guidelines and procedures

· Providing support to General Manager

Requirements:

· Attention to details;

· Good verbal and written proficiency in English;

· Computer literacy at a high level;

· Ability to work in a team and provide overall support to direct colleagues.

Conditions:

· Both options with full and part time can be considered

· Office in the center of Moscow (m. Kurskaya)

· Young and dynamic team

· International environment

Ключевые навыки

Английский язык
MS PowerPoint
MS Outlook
Business English
Поиск информации в интернет
"}
